DOC.brief_summary: The ESOS ( Endoscopic Saphenous harvest Open CO2 System ) trial prospective randomize trial coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) surgery compare endoscopic open CO2 harvesting system versus conventional vein harvesting .
DOC.brief_title: ESOS ( Endoscopic Saphenous Harvesting With Open CO2 System ) Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The ESOS ( Endoscopic Saphenous harvest Open CO2 System ) trial prospective randomize trial coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) surgery compare test improvement wound healing , quality life , safety/efficacy , cost-effectiveness , short long-term outcome vein-graft patency endoscopic open CO2 harvesting system versus conventional vein harvesting .
DOC.criteria: Elective plan CABG surgery First isolate CABG surgery Emergency revascularization : patient hemodynamic instability require inotropic intraaortic balloon support Previous cardiac surgery Planned concomitant valve surgery Very varicous vein Previous saphenectomy History deep vein thrombosis History suffer trauma low extremity Preoperative legs immobilization Previous leg wound complication Coexisting illness life expectancy < five year
